price: 42. ni la palabra de un adivinador, poco es lo que reflexionan.
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
